properties.Observatio: The water source is located in the Neluwalbedda reserve. This is a well-functioning water scheme and villagers said that the stock tanks for storing water are not sufficient.
properties.Descriptio:
Provision of a 10,000 L water storage tank

Preparation of the Foundation for the water tank

Supply of a Plastishells water Tank 

Transport  and Handling

Miscellaneous

Contingencies 10%
